short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop with Freedom - Support Local, Buy Black & Shop Sustainable. Shop Deals, Coupons & Price Track at Amazon and more.

Our mission is to help you Shop Local & Save Money with Coupons!

Let us take the stress of deal finding out of your hands and provide you with your very own online shopping assistant!

‚ÑπÔ∏èHow to install:
1. Click 'Add to Chrome'
2. Redirected to our Success Page 
3. Pin the extension to the toolbar ‚Äî Watch this video for help https://youtu.be/K_b2bGSr_6Y

‚ú®‚ÄÉSUPPORT LOCAL, BUY BLACK, SHOP ECO-FRIENDLY 
We help you shop sustainably. Our marketplace features the locally owned, black & minority owned and eco-conscious shops that help our communities thrive. 

‚ú®‚ÄÉPRICE DROP & WISHLIST ALERTS 
Set up your shopping wishlists in our Price Tracker, so you get notified when the best deals are happening. Pin items to your wishlists directly from any product page. We track the products for you and notify you once the product drops below your desired price. 

‚ú®‚ÄÉDAILY COUPONS AT POPULAR ONLINE SITES
Shop as usual at your favorite online stores, and we'll find you real coupons & offers so you never miss a deal at stores like Target, Sephora and Amazon. Freedom finds the best deals every day!

‚ú®‚ÄÉSAVE MONEY ON AMAZON
Want to save money on Amazon? We help you track products and provide price drop alerts on your favorite items. You can use our extension to find coupons and deals on products too! We make shopping on Amazon easier and save you money!

‚ú®‚ÄÉEXPLORE FREEDOM! 
The Shop with Freedom Extension lets you explore our entertainment options to make your shopping experience more enjoyable. Come see what Freedom has to offer!

If you have any problems with the browser extension, email us at info@freedomrains.com.

Thank you for Shopping with Freedom!
